txt.en: Kópur is still pouting
Kópur is determined to be miserable
Kópur has stubbornly resisted your heartfelt apology!

Ailward Chubb is confused as to why four dwarves have recently left the Inn League without so much as a word. He does not know it, but you harassed them on behalf of the Ale Association. You should make reparations if you wish to do your duty to the Inn League.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Kópur blushes and lets out a giggle

'Kópur will not speak with you at this time. It will take a lot of persuading to convince him not to hate you for your cruel behaviour towards him, you know. You made him very, very sad.

'If you come on behalf of the Inn League, I will tell you how to rouse him, if you wish. I like the Inn League, but I do not care for the Ale Association. Apparently you have seen the folly of your ways and come back to the better society.

'If you want Kópur to rally his spirits, you have to try to amuse him a bit. Poke him, make him laugh, amuse him as best you can. See if you can get a chuckle out of him.'

Kópur is in Noglond, and his friend Karli is with him.\n\nYou should <rgb=#FF0000>perform silly tricks</rgb> for Kópur to make him warm up to you again. Karli might have suggestions as to how best to cheer him up.

'You've done it! I forgot to mention that Kópur just melts when folks pay special attention to him. Your flirting did the trick. Why, he is so cheerful now that I do believe he has all but completely forgotten the nasty business with the Ale Association. Well done, well done.'

Kópur is in Noglond, and his friend Karli is with him.\n\nYou should <rgb=#FF0000>perform silly tricks</rgb> for Kópur to make him warm up to you again. Karli might have suggestions as to how best to cheer him up.

Kópur is in Noglond, and his friend Karli is with him.\n\nYou should <rgb=#FF0000>perform silly tricks</rgb> for Kópur to make him warm up to you again. Karli might have suggestions as to how best to cheer him up.
'Do you know how to <rgb=#FF0000>stand upside-down?</rgb> Kópur is usually impressed by such tricks. You could try that on him.'

Kópur is in Noglond, and his friend Karli is with him.\n\nYou should <rgb=#FF0000>perform silly tricks</rgb> for Kópur to make him warm up to you again. Karli might have suggestions as to how best to cheer him up.
'Why don't you give him a little <rgb=#FF0000>jab with your finger?</rgb> He is known to be very ticklish. Go ahead, give him a nudge.'
Karli is in Noglond.\n\nYou should speak with Karli now that you have successfully cheered up his friend Kópur.
'How strange that he hasn't come out of his sour mood yet! Maybe he wants to hear <rgb=#FF0000>that you have seen the error of your ways.</rgb> A good, heartfelt apology goes a long way.'
Try to cheer up Kópur

'Terrible! He is as stubborn a mule as I ever met. I would have forgiven you ages ago. He probably wants you to <rgb=#FF0000>get him flowers and take him out for dinner, for goodness sake.</rgb> I swear, it is easier to <rgb=#FF0000>woo wilful ladies</rgb> than it is to shake this fellow out of his baleful mood.'
Try to cheer up Kópur
Try to cheer up Kópur
Try to cheer up Kópur
Covert Reparations II -- A Gesture in Jest
Talk to Karli at Noglond
